title: How to Build Confidence in Your Career
content: Confidence isn’t something you’re born with — it’s built through small wins, preparation, and consistency.

title: The Psychology of Great Leaders
content: What separates great leaders from good ones? Emotional intelligence, empathy, and the courage to take responsibility.

title: Why I Love Rainy Days
content: I enjoy reading a book or having a cup of tea while listening to the rain.

title: Enjoying a Cup of Coffee
content: A warm cup of coffee in the morning helps me start the day right. It’s my small daily happiness.
